about_me.des: We are an entrepreneurs familly who love to find solutions to problems and build business around it.

projects.leschatonspelleteurs.ca: This project was launch because Laurence was looking to start a project with her dad and tought about it while walking back from school.

career.nextcode_des: In order to do this project, we had to involve everyone form the familly.
career.netease_des: We need a snow removal service in our community to remove snow in our stairs.
